---
name: V1.4 Multiple Triggers
on:
  issues:
    types: [opened, labeled, closed]
  pull_request:
    types: [opened, synchronize, closed]
  discussion:
    types: [created]
  schedule:
    - cron: '0 12 * * 1'
permissions:
  issues: write
  pull_requests: write
  discussions: write
  contents: read
outputs:
  add-comment: { max: 10 }
  add-label: true
  create-discussion: true
allowed-actors:
  - admin
  - write
max_open_prs: 5
---

# V1.4 Agent with Multiple Triggers

This v1.4 agent responds to multiple event types and has various configuration options.

It demonstrates:
- Multiple trigger types (issues, PRs, discussions, schedule)
- Multiple event types within triggers
- Max open PRs limit
- Various outputs
- Actor restrictions
